attributes.action: Gill Taylor restrict lorries driving in middle lane during peak time periods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask that ministers consider that lorry drivers only use the slow lane on the motorways during peak times to help eleviate accidents.  This is a law in Germany which works very well

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
